Tests that search across files works with formatted scripts.

Pre-format search results:
Search matches: 
lineNumber: 30, line: '        var matches = await scriptSource.searchInContent("magic-string", true, false);'
lineNumber: 40, line: '        var matches = await scriptSource.searchInContent("magic-string", true, false);'
